meanings.definition: A moth with transparent or translucent wings.
meanings.sent1: The clearwing fluttered gracefully in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a clearwing resting on a flower in the garden.
meanings.sent3: Why did the clearwing bring a flashlight to the party? To light up the dance floor!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as delicate and fleeting as a clearwing's flight.
meanings.sent5: The clearwing's wings shimmered like delicate glass in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of borer insect with wings that are partially transparent.
meanings.sent1: The clearwing burrowed into the tree trunk to lay its eggs.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use traps to catch clearwings before they damage crops.
meanings.sent3: Why did the clearwing bring a magnifying glass to the picnic? To get a closer look at the food!
meanings.sent4: The clearwing's transparent wings seemed to vanish against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The clearwing's delicate wings allowed it to blend seamlessly with the leaves.

meanings.definition: A type of butterfly with wings that are clear or transparent.
meanings.sent1: Children marveled at the beauty of the clearwing fluttering in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The clearwing gracefully landed on the blooming flower.
meanings.sent3: Why did the clearwing refuse to play hide and seek? Because it couldn't hide anywhere!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant and transparent as a clearwing's wings.
meanings.sent5: The clearwing's transparent wings revealed a mosaic of colors when it flew.
